title: Unspecified error 2.0
body: Ive tried absolutely everything to get the game to update but its always giving me the unspecified error thing. what should i do. has anybody found a fix to this. is riot aware???????

replies.body:
Hi

Have you tried working through the steps in the [Patching Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues) support article?  Hopefully that will help you get back on the Rift!

If that doesn't help - it might be a good idea to send in a support request to get some 1:1 help

Cheers!
Mindstar
